job.description:
{"@context": "http://schema.org", "@type": "JobPosting", "datePosted": "2021-08-17T07:28:24.000Z", "description": "

Title - Senior Java Software Engineer

Type - Fulltime

Location - San Jose, California, United States

 

Requirements:

  • Four or more years of programming experience in Java, Scala and or/ Python.
  • Two or more years of experience in AWS or other Cloud platforms like Azure/GCP
  • Two or more years of experience in Kafka or other messaging technologies such as Google Pub/Sub, RabbitMQ
  • Three or more years of experience in one or more databases: noSQL databases like MongoDB, Cassandra or relational databases like DynamoDB/Aurora
  • Experience with development frameworks, monitoring tools, command-line applications (Spring Boot, git, ssh, grafana/prometheus/datadog) and other aspects of developing in large, distributed software teams
  • Experience in one or more unit and e2e testing frameworks like JUnit, JMeter, Locust, BlazeMeter Exposure to Big Data pipelines and technologies.


Responsibilities:

  • Work across technology boundaries (networking, compute, security, storage, analytics) to develop cloud native microservices to meet the strategic needs of the company
  • Develop a scalable system using Cloud development paradigms and constructs of distributed deployment
  • Ability to create quality code with good development and test practices that produce least amount of issues in the field
  • Work closely with Product Management and the CTO group to define the product architecture and leads its development
  • Assist with pre-sales customer discussions to understand the Enterprise deployment models and their requirements.
